name: Drunken Dragon
description:
A puzzle game for GMTK 2020, Out of Control.

You play as a drunk warrior who cannot control his killer instinct. He is throwing attacks every which way, and the gang is out to get him. You must move him so that his random attacks, which are out of your control, make contact with the enemies.

Note: HTML5 is buggy, the Windows version is recommended.

Escape key toggles fullscreen on Windows.

===================================

Credits:

Levi Pinkert - Game Design & Programming

Karamelian - Art

Javy - Music & Sound
